DOC.brief_summary: Study healthy male assess bioavailability single fostamatinib iv micro tracer dose .
DOC.brief_title: Study Healthy Males Assess Bioavailability Single Fostamatinib With iv Micro Tracer Dose
DOC.detailed_description: A Study Assess Absolute Bioavailability Single Oral Dose Fostamatinib Respect Intravenous Micro Tracer Dose [ 14C ] R406 Healthy Male Volunteers .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male volunteer age 18 55 year ( inclusive ) , weight least 50 kg body mass index ( BMI ) 18 30 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) Male volunteer willing use barrier contraception ie , condom spermicide , first day investigational product administration 3 month last administration investigational product History clinically significant disease disorder History presence GI , hepatic , renal disease condition know interfere absorption , distribution , metabolism , excretion drug Any clinically significant illness , medical/surgical procedure trauma within 4 week first administration drug Volunteers smoke 5 cigarette equivalent tobacco per day Any clinically significant abnormality clinical chemistry , hematology urinalysis result judge Investigator
